rComments: Andy is awesome. He's very passionate, peppy, and practical. The class is well organized, although the problem sets/labs can be very wordy +  confusing. Intimidating course, but try to keep up because he's very fair. Demanding course work, the oncoming assignments are relentless. Cute proff, wish I met someone like him during college /3

Andy is hands down my favorite professor I've interacted with so far at UCSC. As an EPS major, I took Eart10 for major credit. Andy is willing to go above and beyond to help any of his students. If you ask for help, he will be there for you. Nicest guy. 1010.

Andy is probably one of the best teachers I have had at UCSC. He is very knowledgeable of the subject and presents the material in a way that isn't boring. The midterm and final aren't too hard as long as you pay attention in class and do all the assigned hw assignments. I highly recommend taking a class with Andy Fisher!

A GREAT professor who is always willing to help and answer questions. He makes the material very engaging and fun with his stories and the "celebrity daycare centers." The tests and assignments are easy if you attend class and section regularly. I would definitely recommend his class.

Andy is amazing. His lectures are engaging and interesting, and extremely well organized. He added fun anecdotes (why streets crack, celebrity daycare centers, etc.) and really sets the course up to be accessible to anyone. Would definitely take another class from him.

Andy is an incredible teacher. he's funny and incredibly knowledgeable. His thoughts about celebrity daycare's are hilarious. If you try i guarantee Andy will ensure that you do well; if not, good luck. Deff take this class if you are willing to put in the work.

Andy was a great teacher, but dont take this class if you think it will be an easy A. You have to work and the material does not come easy. There is a lot of material and jargon you need to know. Really great teacher but only take if your interested in the material

Andy is a great guy. He is super helpful and nice, and very funny. His Geology class is great. Like everyone said, there's a decent amount of work and you have to go to section, but it's reasonable, interesting and relevant. He's totally got the hot nerd thing going on. Makes lectures more interesting for sure. Take this class! :)
fun interesting lectures when he's actually lecturing... powerpoints: not so much.  easily approachable and helpful. hw is somewhat tedious but there isnt a lot of it.  earth 10 is not a scrub class.

This is one of the best teachers I've had at UCSC. The class is not easy, but it's enjoyable to learn the material the way he teaches it. He's very professional and organized. This class is really cool.

Andy's a really excellent teacher, kept the class fun and interesting, and moved at a good pace, etc. He's very funny at times, and the work's not too difficult.  I'd recommend taking the lab too so you can go on the field trip.

Totally true about the 'celebrity daycare center' thing in his slides! He's such an awesome professor...very sympathetic, understanding and helpful, especially if you're having serious trouble getting the material(which i did, yet still managed to pass). Also, he sort of looks like bob saget.

Andy was extremely helpful: He did everything in his power to insure that the students new what was going on and what to expect on exams. If you are interested in the water industry, and want to take a class that focuses on real world applications instead of unreasonably complex math problems, take this class!

Whoever said Andy's class was difficult is on some serious crack. For the most part, the problem sets and labs were cake. The paper at the end is not bad either, and presenting is optional. Always willing to steer you in the right direction. He does have a strange fixation for daycare centers for celebrity children hehe loved going to office hours
He's a cutie!  A lot of the Earth Science profs are hot.  Interesting class for a GE.  Learned a lot about how the oceans work.  Colder, older, denser!

Ok, look. If you're doing the whole Earth Science thing, you MUST take this class. THIS CLASS WILL GET YOU A JOB. Plus... it's Andy. He'll make it damn fun, but also damn difficult. TAKE THIS CLASS!!! You'll thank me later.

Andy is the BEST TEACHER at UCSC! He is soooo nice, and very funny. ALways burns, floods, contaminates, collapses etc. "Daycare centers for children of celebrities" in his powerpoint pictures. Very helpful, really fun class, homework not too har
